alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 19 at 5:39AM PDT until October 19 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT TODAY BELOW 3000 FEET IN ELEVATION... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog and patchy dense smoke. * WHERE...South Willamette Valley, as well as the Cascade and Cascade foothill valleys below 3000 feet. * WHEN...Until noon PDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility varies dramatically throughout the advisory area. Drivers should be prepared for sudden changes in visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. If travelling on foot or by bike, be sure to wear reflective colors to improve your chances of being seen by others.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; South Willamette Valley
